alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 12:22AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong line of thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Otero, southeastern El Paso, Crowley and northern Pueblo Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1222 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong line of thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles south of Truckton to Avondale to 7 miles southwest of Salt Creek. Movement was southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Boone around 1225 AM MDT. Fowler around 1240 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Olney Springs, Ordway, Manzanola and Sugar City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
